title: Provides for exemptions for utilizing local labor sources in Orange county
summary: Provides for exemptions for utilizing local labor sources in Orange county; defines "local labor source" to include persons from Orange county or any adjoining county to be determined by the local legislative authority of Orange county where the real property is located or from a bona fide labor union whose jurisdiction includes Orange county.
